codes.UNAUTHORIZED_INVALID_JWT: Your session is invalid. Please sign in again.
codes.UNAUTHORIZED_EXPIRED_JWT: Your session expired. Please sign in again.
codes.FORBIDDEN: You don't have access to do that.
codes.FORBIDDEN_USER_NOT_FOUND: Your account could not be found.
codes.BACKEND_STARTING: The server is starting up. Please try again shortly.
codes.NOT_A_MEMBER: You are not a member of this game.
codes.INSUFFICIENT_ROLE: You don't have permission to do that.
codes.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
codes.PHASE_MISMATCH: That action isn't available right now.
codes.INVALID_TRUMP_CONVERSION: That choice of trumps is not valid.
codes.VALIDATION_ERROR: Please check your input and try again.
codes.INVALID_HEADER: Your request is missing required information.
codes.GAME_NOT_FOUND: That game could not be found.
codes.USER_NOT_FOUND: Your account could not be found.
codes.PLAYER_NOT_FOUND: That player could not be found.
codes.NOT_FOUND: We couldn't find what you were looking for.
codes.GOOGLE_SUB_MISMATCH: This email is linked to a different Google account.
codes.UNIQUE_EMAIL: That email is already in use.
codes.OPTIMISTIC_LOCK: This game changed. Please refresh and try again.
codes.CONFLICT: That couldn't be completed because something changed.
codes.DB_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.
codes.DB_UNAVAILABLE: The server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again.
codes.DB_POOL_EXHAUSTED: The server is busy. Please try again.
codes.DB_TIMEOUT: That took too long. Please try again.
codes.LOCK_TIMEOUT_ACQUIRE: The server is busy. Please try again.
codes.LOCK_TIMEOUT_BODY: The server is busy. Please try again.
codes.MIGRATION_CANCELLED: The server is restarting. Please try again.
codes.MIGRATION_FAILED: The server is restarting. Please try again.
codes.POSTCHECK_MISMATCH: The server is restarting. Please try again.
codes.SQLITE_LOCK_ERROR: The server is busy. Please try again.
codes.RECORD_NOT_FOUND: We couldn't find what you were looking for.
codes.INTERNAL: Something went wrong. Please try again.
codes.INTERNAL_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.
codes.CONFIG_ERROR: The server is misconfigured. Please contact support.
codes.DATA_CORRUPTION: Something went wrong. Please contact support.
codes.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.
